instructors.instructor_addr: Catalysis Bldg, Rm 325, 2137 Tech Drive, EV CAMPUS

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Analysis of vibrations in single and multi-degree-of-freedom systems. Free and forced vibrations with various types of damping. Response to steady-state and transient excitations.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Engineering Vibration, Daniel J. Inman, Prentice Hall, 3rd edition, ISBN 978-0132281737.
